Sadness Top: When a day-old meme is already stale
Sadness Bottom: you wake up and the charger wasn't plugged in
and you lowkey miss being the center of attention
Happiness Top: When you finally realize your winter body
When someone explains something to you three times
When you're about as ready for school
When you get a 30 on the midterm
Happiness Bottom: and you still have no idea what's going on
as Mariah Carey was for the new year
Contempt Top: When you hold the door for someone
When you thought your meme was edgy
When someone gets up to hand in their final
Contempt Bottom: and people keep bringing junk food to work
but you're still flipping through the exam trying to find a problem you can actually solve
Fear Top: When you find out you need a 425% on the final
Neutral Top: I didn't choose the thug life
When you retake a class after failing
When you were supposed to start your paper at 8pm
When you try to caffeinate yourself
Neutral Bottom: but now it's 2am and all you've done is look at memes
but you just end up increasing your heart rate while remaining exhausted
